fixes.name: Overall Rating
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Priority Segment] = "Top Priority", 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Health Score] + 1, 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Health Score])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF and mapped field references to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Column]. This is row-level logic (no aggregates or parameters), so it is implemented as a calculated column.
